dcterms:creator: T. S. Rappaport
H. Q. Ngo
E. G. Larsson
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the opportunities and challenges associated with wireless communications and applications above 100 GHz, particularly in the context of 6G and beyond.
dcterms:title: THz-based communications

dcterms:creator: H. Q. Ngo
dcterms:description: This dataset compares cell-free massive MIMO with small cells, highlighting the advantages of cell-free architecture in terms of network connectivity and efficiency.
dcterms:title: Cell-free massive MIMO

dcterms:creator: H. Q. Ngo
E. G. Larsson
dcterms:description: This dataset involves EVD-based channel estimation techniques in multicell multiuser MIMO systems, particularly focusing on systems with very large antenna arrays.
dcterms:title: Channel estimation

dcterms:creator: N. Auguin
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses the large-dimensional behavior of regularized Maronnas M-estimators of covariance matrices, relevant for adaptive filtering in high-dimensional scenarios.
dcterms:title: Adaptive filtering
